short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing security with Securify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Securify is a browser extension that allows you to get a second opinion on the safety of a website.

Key Features:

Safety Level Assessment: Based on thorough analysis results, Securify assesses the safety level of websites you visit and offers up-to-date insights into potential risks.

Comprehensive Analysis: Acquire access to comprehensive analysis outcomes, encompassing the number of malevolent, dubious, undiscovered, and benign activities identified on every website, enabling you to make knowledgeable choices while perusing.


Privacy Protection: Securify was developed with privacy in mind. It makes sure that all data is safely stored locally, protecting the confidentiality and privacy of your online activities.

Educational Resources: To improve your knowledge of typical online threats and best practices for preserving online security, access a plethora of educational resources and security advice.

User-Friendly Interface: Securify offers easy access to crucial security features through an intuitive interface that is made for a smooth integration into your browsing experience.


This is my second Chrome extension, feel free to contact me via my LinkedIn (linked on extension)

-Alan
